summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 discussing photos of Ghislaine Maxwell giving a foot massage. An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is inquiring about the origin of the photos to ensure they were properly marked as responsive if they were on the CAIRES system.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The email discusses photos of Maxwell giving a foot massage, which are being inquired about by a prosecutor.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: An unnamed Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is following up about photos of Maxwell to ensure they were marked responsive if on the CAIRES system.

events.title: Email inquiry about Maxwell photos
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails to ask about the origin of photos showing Ghislaine Maxwell giving a foot massage, specifically checking if they were on the CAIRES system and marked as responsive.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Photos exist showing Ghislaine Maxwell giving a foot massage.
A prosecutor from the Southern District of New York was actively inquiring about these photos in October 2020 to ensure they were properly documented in the case evidence system (CAIRES).
The email indicates ongoing investigative work regarding evidence related to Ghislaine Maxwell around the time of her prosecution.
